name: VackyVacuumer
description:
You are the vacuum cleaning robot on a space station. After the garbage press exploded dirt and mutated D.R.E.C.K is everywhere and crew members have lost some of their possessions. Clean the station, defeat dirty enemies, help the crew, and save the day.

Entry of the Global Game Jam 2020

Downloadable Version is available here:

https://github.com/Liech/VackyVacuumer
